actions: Identify all entry points to position
Place fences on doors, stairs, and choke points
Deploy pylon in protected location (behind cover)
Position near pylon for shield regen
pre_fight.timing: Setup before enemies arrive (early rotation enables this)

fight_start.information_gathering: Monitor fence triggers for enemy movement
fight_start.communication: Call out fence breaches to team

if_holding: Replace destroyed fences if cooldowns allow
Take shield regen breaks behind cover
Focus fire on slowed enemies breaking through fences
if_pushed: Fall back to secondary fence layer
Use opportunistic fences to block pursuers
Don't panic - slowed enemies are vulnerable
Coordinate with team to punish breach

if_winning: Push cautiously only if numbers advantage
Leave one fence layer intact for third party defense
Quickly re-setup after fight (nodes respawn on 30s cooldown)

third_party_response.defending: Pylon and fences should block third party grenades and entry - huge advantage
third_party_response.third_partying: Low priority - Wattson is not a third party legend, stay in strong position
